I really like the style of this course. You can exchange ideas with your classmates and create better outcome together.  The professor can give clearer order in terms of the assignments, so that we can work better towards his expectation.
作業有一點繁複，但都是值得練習與挑戰的，我收穫很多，謝謝老師用心帶動一次又一次的討論。
